snippet: Wolfgang Niersbach, the president of the German soccer federation, resigned on Monday amid scrutiny over a payment to FIFA.
abstract: German soccer federation president Wolfgang Niersbach resigns, claiming decision is unrelated to investigation of financial misconduct involving FIFA; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Wolfgang Niersbach, the president of the German soccer federation, resigned on Monday amid scrutiny over a payment to FIFA.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; German Official Quits
